properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM,S.* FROM ( SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, N.NOTICE_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NAME, N.CREATE_DATE, N.COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC )S)WHERE "ROWNUM" BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_ID=? AND STATUS='Y'
SELECT NOTICE_ID ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,MEMBER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE ,COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE NOTICE_ID= ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE (NOTICE_TITLE LIKE ? OR NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE ?) AND N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC

SELECT NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC

SELECT NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
SELECT FILE_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM NOTICE_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? ,NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_ID = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE NOTICE_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_ID = ?
SELECT PREV, NEXT FROM (SELECT NOTICE_ID,LAG(NOTICE_ID) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_ID) AS PREV, LEAD(NOTICE_ID) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_ID) AS NEXT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y') WHERE NOTICE_ID=?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS='Y'
